component.name: Syntalos
component.summary: Flow-based synchronized parallel DAQ from diverse sources and flexible control for neuroscience experiments

description.p: Syntalos is a software for timestamp-synchronized parallel data acquisition from diverse data sources. It is especially useful for in-vivo behavior tracking, electrophysiology, Miniscope recordings and control of automated closed-loop experiments in neuroscience. Its modularity allows it to be used for a wide variety of different experiment types.

The project contains many modules by default which allow acquisition of data from a wide array of data sources, as well as common online processing tasks. Some modules may require 3rd-party components to work properly.
